name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.17.7-6747cd2894f49d0a5825d3f8a3e4057826532683 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
